SCTX:
Begin AirshipJournalScript 

short done

if ( done == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Airship >= 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Airship < 40 )
	 	if ( onactivate == 1 )
			Journal "BM_Airship" 5
			ShowMap "Hrothmund's Bane"
			set done to 1
			activate
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Airship >= 40 )
	 if ( onactivate == 1 )
		Journal "BM_Airship" 60
		ShowMap "Hrothmund's Bane"
		set done to 1
		activate
	endif
endif


End AirshipJournalScript
